• Over the course of this week I made a few small break-throughs culminating in the realisation that: If after one week I suspected that cleaning, sorting and separating garbage was about to become a big part of my life - Now after three I know the remainder will become all about points.

It sings "PayPay" after every transaction completes. Tokyo's local government is also currently running a promotion meaning extra cash-back for using it. OMG it is game-changing. The app is so fast to use (like, contactless payments feel slow compared to IC payments, and this is another level quicker!?)

This is a big deal, because as well as theoretically acting as a driving license and making the healthcare system easier to use, it also unlocks a bunch more things I can do with money and payments.
